import React, {useContext} from 'react' import { GlobalState } from '../../../GlobalState' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Cart() { const state = useContext(GlobalState) const [cart] = state.useAPI.cart if(cart.length === 0) return

Cart Empty

return (
{ cart.map(product => (

{product.title}

$ {product.price * product.quantity}

{product.description}

{product.content}

Sold: {product.sold}

Buy Now
)) }
) } export default Cart
